Name: VirtualMachineInfo
SummaryComment: Info about the current state of the virtual machine.

Key.Name: ImageReference
Key.SummaryComment: The reference to the Azure Virtual Machine's Marketplace Image.

Key.Name: ScaleSetVmResourceId
Key.SummaryComment: The resource ID of the Compute Node's current Virtual Machine Scale Set VM. Only defined if the Batch Account was created with its poolAllocationMode property set to 'UserSubscription'.
